article_text:
Topics: News

“The investigation so far has developed indications of radicalization by the killers and of potential inspiration by foreign terrorist organizations.” — FBI Director James Comey, declaring that the agency is investigating the deadly mass shooting in California as an “act of terrorism.”

___

“When Clinton drops her first surname, she’s just following the norms in society. She wants to be president and middle America doesn’t want her to be Rodham. It’s a good political position to take.” — Republican Sen. Shelley Moore Capito of West Virginia on Hillary Clinton’s recent decision to drop “Rodham” from her name.

___

“I can’t deal with this right now. It’s true.” — Jamie Weiland, rocker Scott Weiland’s wife, in a tearful confirmation of his death to the Los Angeles Times.
